title: Mirror Image Photo Editor Pro v1.1.3 APK [SadeemPC]
description:
Mirror Image Photo Editor Pro v1.1.3
Requirements: Android 2.3 and up

Do you love mirror effect in photos? Do you love doing it on your own? If yes, download the free android app Mirror Image on your android device and start running a photo studio at your fingertips.	

How the app works
The free android app Mirror Image allows you to create mirror effect in your photos. You can create left-right, up-down, reflection, repeating as well as reflection style enabled photos with this photo editor app. Furthermore you can apply several photo effects and designer photo frames to these mirror photos for making them more attractive.

It will take hardly few minutes time to get the app downloaded on your android device. It is easy to use and the app will unleash the hidden artist in you.

Check its amazing features before you download the app:
- You can select photo from gallery or you can capture a new snap by camera for creating mirror effect,
- You can use left right mirror, repeat-4, up down mirror, and reflect 4 reflections: the app will work as an expert photo editor,
- You can use more than 50 unique photo frames and around 30 photo filters,
- Touch to move the photo for adjusting the mirror effect as per discretion,
- You can randomly apply mirror effect, filter effect, as well as you can add photo frame for creating a designer photo effects.
- You can share the photo on Instagram as well as post it on the social networking sites likeand Twitter.
- You can enjoy other value added features like adjustment of brightness adjustment, contrast, warmth, saturation, and auto color adjustment for the most dramatic effect.

Now with the app Mirror Image you can be the expert photography editor and you will be able to create wonderful photos of your own as well as for your loved ones.

What is more than others:
15 new Mirror Effect
Select multiple image ratio.
Provides highest resolution results.
Tablet design provide more space for photos.
Contrast adjustment
Warmth adjustment
Brightness adjustment
Tint adjustment
Saturation adjustment
37 unique effects
Auto color
Auto contrast.
Tens of fancy borders and frames
Put vignette filters on your images

What's New:
- Collage layout lock support.
- Collage layout size change fix.
- Delete All button added for gallery.
- Better grid spacing algorithm.
- 5 new collage layouts.

Homepage 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lyrebirdstudio.colorizer.pro
